mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as role_name from t_user a inner join t_role b on a.role_id=b.id where a.code=#{username} and a.password=#{password} and a.status=1
select b.id,b.name,b.path,b.pid from t_permission a inner join t_menu b on a.menu_id=b.id where a.role_id=#{roleId}
select a.id,a.name,a.code,a.role_id,b.name as role_name from t_user a inner join t_role b on a.role_id=b.id where a.code like '%'||#{code}||'%' or a.name like '%'||#{code}||'%'
select a.id,a.name,a.code,a.role_id,b.name as role_name from t_user a inner join t_role b on a.role_id=b.id where a.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update t_user set name=#{name},role_id=#{roleId} where id=#{id}
